reviews.review: The community on both the killer side and survivor side can be a little toxic at times, but that's to be expected. I love this game. It's really one of the only games I play anymore. It stays interesting because there's always new content coming out and it's super fun to play with friends. I actually met my spouse because of this game! I definitely would recommend it to anyone.

I like playing it (most of the time). Aside from recurring problems and bugs, it's a must-have for multiplayer gamers. Nice characters, original and licensed either. Fun guaranteed (maybe not always for the reasons its intended, but in the end who cares right?)
Fun with friends, otherwise it can be a bit stressful
idk its a good game my dude
переедь меня хоть танком я всё равно останусь панком
This game has consumed what was left of my life, all I know is it's either them or me, and I will surely survive.

I am really surprised with this game. When I bought it I didn't expect that much from it to be honest. But now that I played it a lot I have to say it is pretty impressive. This horror multiplayer game is such an amazing idea. I really don't play horror games that much but this one is something different. I really enjoy the idea of being a Killer that slaughters every survivor or at least thats the goal. Or playing as a survivor and trying to escape from a death sentence :)
IN A FEW WORDS - FUN, DARK, COMPETITIVE.

Things I really like:
-4v1 Competitive Horror Multiplayer Game
-Being a Killer and trying to slaughter all the survivors (atm there are only 3 killers - trapper,hillbilly&wraith)
-Being a Survivor and trying to escape from hell basically (atm there are only 4 survivors - dwight,meg,claudette&jake)
-Having a rank system from 20 to 1 , 1 being the highest one.
-Maps are generated differently everytime which means only landmarks will be in the same position the rest is random.
-Every match is different so it doesn't get that repetitive.
-A lot of different perks and addons you can use for your killer/survivor build.
-KILL YOUR FRIENDS - the ability to make a private lobby invite your friends and kill them :p
-SURVIVE WITH FRIENDS - the ability to start a ranked game with 3 of your friends.
-And I really like that they update the game often to fix the problems and also add new content.

Things I don't like:
-The game is a bit too grindy I would say.
-Matchmaking is an issue if you want to play SURVIVE WITH FRIENDS - it takes 10+ minutes to find a game.
-Some of the perks that are in-game are that bad that nobody ever uses them.
-No timer for matches. So if a survivor wants can keep the killer hostage in the game until someone disconnects.
no prostě uteč, přežij nebo chcípni :D

Gra bardzo fajna.
Polecam do grania ze znajomymi jak i samemu. Przy pomocy innych
graczy łatwo nauczyć się grać.
Mimo pewnych trudności i czasami bugów, gre polecam.
Dobrze łączy survival horror z grą multiplayer i zręcznościówką.
Gran juego para pasar un rato de chill!!... Si te lo vas a tomar en modo tryhard prepárate para terminar con mas de un enojo encima ya que muchas veces la comunidad no acompaña

Absolutely one of my favorite multiplayer games, Dead by Daylight gets my heart pumping everytime I am chasing or being chased. Even if some of the community is toxic, and the devs are slow to understand what we want, they are doing their best and often surprise me with great ideas. This game requires patience thou, expecially if you intend on playing as killer, but there is still LOADS of fun to be had.

Ne vous faites pas avoir! Ce jeu est à fuir!

Si au premier abord, il s'agit d'un jeu angoissant,  fun à jouer entre amis et très addictif, ces émotions se transformeront peu à peu en frustration. Frustration amplifiée par les comportements excessivement toxiques de la communauté. Car oui, le gros point noir de Dead by Daylight, c'est sa communauté. Des survivants qui pensent avoir tout compris au jeu et sont incapables de prendre du recul, de comprendre ô combien il est délicat pour les tueurs de gagner et de prendre du plaisir dans le jeu. Des tueurs qui ne font aucun effort, ne cherchent pas à s'améliorer et s'adonnent à la réponse la plus primaire qu'il soit aux outrances des survivants . Dead by Daylight est l'antre de la toxicité à l'instar d'un moba bien célèbre. Chose étonnante pour un jeu bien moins populaire.

Sur le jeu en lui même, celui-ci à beaucoup évolué au fil des ans. S'il est devenu quelque chose de plutôt positif ces derniers temps (à l'origine il était profondément déséquilibré et mauvais, puis il est resté médiocre la plupart du temps), il reste mal optimisé, truffé de mécaniques hasardeuses et de bugs et ne parlons pas des récents serveurs dédiés qui rendent énormément d'actions auparavant certaines, complètement aléatoires (et ce, en tueur comme en survivant). En outre, on peut ajouter les problèmes récurrents de matchmaking ainsi que les files d'attente particulièrement longues en survivant (les deux sont malheureusement liés, plus le matchmaking sera précis, plus les files d'attentes seront longues).

Les développeurs sont à l'écoute de la communauté et font énormément d'efforts pour améliorer le jeu. Cependant, ils ne cessent de faire des mauvais choix qui vont compliquer les problèmes existants, d'autant plus qu'il y a énormément de bugs/problèmes qui ont été laissé en suspend.
GAYET BAŞARILI SIKMAYAN BİR OYUN. TAVSİYE EDERİM.

可以入坑的遊戲，但建議【有朋友帶】會比較好

單排人容易被多排人選擇性放生
或不懂什麼時候該做什麼事，導致逃生率低，久了就不想玩

新手殺手則是容易被多排玩，要當殺手就要有心理準備
要花很多時間來練習各種技巧
簡單的說...殺手玩家就是抖M、被虐狂

排隊系統的不友善，會讓新手殺手配對到紅/紫段人
容易出現新手鬼撞上車隊/人皇團...等，就有非常不好的遊戲體驗
一個1對四的不對稱遊戲，官方卻用2殺2逃來當平衡點
但是殺手方會很容易發生3殺都無法RK+1，基本上2殺就是+0
殺手方容錯率低，倖存者容錯率高

要玩得好，【那就要人/殺手雙方都要玩】
不用很精通殺手或人，但至少知道人/鬼之間的心理狀態，跟視野死角
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
PS：但這款遊戲官方極度不重視殺手玩家
Hiç düşünmeden alın derim fiatı da gayet uygun.
Nach wie vor ein sehr tolles Spiel.
Gets better with time. One of those devs who do actually create value based content.

Como posso dizer , antigamente era legal jogar agora ta uma merda simplismente depois que fico de graça so tem pessoas que estragam o jogo não da nem pra ficar 1 minuto no jogo so tem piscicopata jogando de assassino que não sabe jogar, tirou a graça do jogo. E pra piorar mesmo que eu sai da partida porque fico chato ainda tomo ban de 5 minutos esse jogo de fama foi pra lixo com todo respeito mas e assim que eu enchergo perdi tempo e dinheiro jogando isso.
Pretty neat, good community and healthy state rn. epic

Tödlicher Spaß für Groß und Klein!

Herein spaziert, herein spaziert... all ihr Fleischsäcke!
Gratis werdet ihr eingeharkt in dieses saftige Spiel! Da trifft nur so der "rote" Schweiß....  die Nerven werden auf Hochtouren gebracht... höhö! Das reinste Vergnügen...  für jeden Fitness Fanatiker genau das richtig! Das Fangen Spiel für alleeee! Hihihiihi schnuppert Gas, Strom & mehr!

Ho ho ho und das Mori sei mit euch!
Игра воодушевляющая, подталкивает на новые свершения
its fun bit the anumashens are garno but still the game play is good
really good game, many facecampers and tunnelers but sometimes it is funny

Dead By Daylight é um jogo muito bom pra se jogar com os amigos se você for um sobrevivente e solo se você for killer, o único problema que eu enfrento bastante é ter que esperar pra achar lobby quando vou jogar de killer, mas fora isso é um ótimo jogo.
Ciekawa i fajna giereczka dla ekip

Dead by Daylight: *[i]Se cae a pedazos[/i]*

Behaviour: [b]Terrible[/b]. [i]Saquemos mas skins y licencias[/i].

Básicamente, Behaviour podría catalogarse como la típica empresa que se deja estar y no toma en serio los problemas que tiene su juego. Hoy en día el estado actual del juego es penoso, solo empeora cada día y perdió uno de los factores mas importantes [b][u]LA DIVERSIÓN[/u][/b]...No vale la pena enumerar todos los problemas que tiene ya que [i][spoiler](vos mismo que estas leyendo esto tampoco los vas leer)[/spoiler][/i] los devs hacen caso omiso y aparentemente solo les interesa lucrarse a base de skins, pases de batalla y licencias.

No lo recomiendo, inviertan su dinero en algo mas que valga la pena.

 [i]"I think we did a pretty good job so far"[/i] - Mathieu Cote.
Super amazing game where you can get both excited and super tense. Great competitiveness, all around a great game,
I think we did a pretty good job so far

This game is one of the best games i have ever played , especially when u are playing with ur friends this game gets even better totaly worth its cost and the art work of the game is great as well as the gameplay and the perks . 

8/10

Fixing hitboxes should fix the whole game ))

O game simplesmente não acha partida de jeito nenhum! Único dia que conseguir jogar foi numa sexta-feita a tarde e só! Nos outros dias não acha partida nem a pau.
Tá louco, 45 minutos na fila e nada! Ridículo!
It is fun to play. Avoid playing during events.
Fajna gierka, ciągły stresik wiesz ocb mordeczko mi się tam podoba bardzo
Não gostei, da medo. Reembolsei n gosto de jogo q da medo gosto de jogo colorido . xau obrigado!

Ich liebe dieses Drecksgame. Echt, das ist jetzt kein Witz. In manchen Runden wird man hart durchgenommen, als Killer, wie auch als Survivor. Wie in jedem Mehrspielerspiel gibt es auch in Dead by Daylight harte Missgeburten, welche den Spielspass einschränken. Trotzdem, das Game bockt sowas von. Jede Runde ist individuell und mit jedem Update wird das Spiel fairer. Auch kommen andauernd neue Inhalte, was einfach eine tolle Sache ist. Vom Gameplay kenne ich nicht viele andere Spiele, welche mit Dead by Daylight mithalten können.

Coming into this game, there are some things that are not apparent initially that players should be aware of.  If you view the game with these viewpoints, then it's a decent to good game.  If not, then it's going to be pretty trashy.


This is not a horror game.  This is a time management game wrapped up in horror visuals.  It's all about maximizing your time used while minimizing your opponents.


This game isn't designed to be balanced competitively.  It's a casual game at it's core, and the mechanics within the game reflects this.  The devs show no indication that they want it as anything other than something that we play casually.


Both sides can 'win' or both sides can 'lose' at the same time.  Because of how the devs measure success, it's not a zero sum game.  


The skill ceiling in the game is extremely low, and it's mostly measured in game knowledge.  With enough time, almost everyone could reach the 'highest player level', it's just not a whole lot of people want to put in that work.
Its fun for those who like to grab vicory out of the jaws of defeat and for those who want to stomp their foes into the ground,
find your friends and hide your wifi cause you will have a good time
